name: Childcare
description: Children between the ages of 2.5 to 5 years and 11 months old are eligible for our program. We ask that each child be toilet-trained prior to admission. A physical examination by your doctor and a complete set of immunization records are also required. We do not discriminate regarding a child's race, sex, color, gender or religion. Full-day and Part-time programs are available. Full day: Monday through Friday, 7:00am- 5:30pm Part-Time: 2 or 3 full days per week, 7:00am - 5:30pm Tuition includes
